source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: 21 Creative Organic Handmade Soap Recipes for Beginners
items.headline: Learn 21 + Creative Handmade Soap Recipes for Beginners
objectives_summary: Creative Handmade Soap Recipes for Beginners (part 1)
Popular Soapmaking methods
Carved crystal soap

items.title: Acrylic Mixing for the Complete Beginner
items.headline: with Diane Flick
objectives_summary: Primarily, students will learn to mix primary, secondary, tertiary and complementary colors in acrylic. Secondarily, they will also learn how to set up their mixing/painting space, how to use a palette knife, and how to manage their palette for efficiency and control.

items.title: How to Make Handmade Jewelry and Make Studded jewelry Easily
items.headline: This course is complete guideline to make Handmade jewelry easily
objectives_summary: How to make Handmade jewelry step by step
How to make Earrings, How to make Bracelets
Methods to create Stud Bracelets

items.title: Learn How to Crochet a Crop Top Step by Step
items.headline: Push your crochet skills to the next level and learn to crochet your own crochet crop top.
objectives_summary: To crochet a crop top from start to finish in your preferrd size (Small, Medium, Large)
Why crochet gauge is important and how to make a gauge swatch.
To crochet on both sides of a foundation chain, to crochet down the side of stitches and how to connect crochet motifs.

items.title: Creación de personaje
items.headline: Aprende herramientas que te servirán para el resto de tu carrera como actor/actriz.
objectives_summary: Creación de personaje en la actuación

items.title: Tropical Fruit Series: WATERMELONS [course 1] in Watercolor
items.headline: Paint cute fruit postcards while practicing main watercolor techniques.
objectives_summary: How to select art materials for a fruity painting.
How to draw shapes of watermelons.
How to mix colors to achieve the best color combinations to paint a watermelon.

items.title: Portrait sketching easy. Full face and profile view
items.headline: An easy way for everybody to draw recognizable portraits in full face and profile view
objectives_summary: You'll get all information and skills to draw recognizable portraits in two main positions: full face and profile view

items.title: Watercolor for beginner artists
items.headline: the basics of watercolor art
objectives_summary: learning the fundamentals of watercolor painting
improving painting skills
learning to create impressive artwork

items.title: Learn to sew a Brush Roll
items.headline: for pens, markers, pencils ... an accessory for artists, calligraphers, designers, writers
objectives_summary: Make a fabulous accessory, a Brush Roll, for storing and transporting art brushes, calligraphy pens, coloured pencils and the like.
Learn to apply bias binding.
A technique for making your own labels.

items.title: Make a Wooden Book Holder

visible_instructors.name: Art
visible_instructors.title: Art School Online
visible_instructors.job_title: Online Education For Become a Better Artist

items.headline: A wooden tool to enjoy the reading book !
objectives_summary: The best way to create and craft beautiful book holder
In this course we will teach you to step by step tutorials with full details .
Learn how to use carving tools

items.title: How to make decorative glass blocks
items.headline: This course will cover many different ideas that we can do with glass block but we will focus on painting.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to create a decorative glass block to give as a gift or for your own decorative purposes.

items.title: How To Make Fabric Accessories
items.headline: Your Step By Step Guide To Making Fabric Accessories
objectives_summary: How To Make Fabric Accessories

items.title: Flower/Floral Letter Step by step
items.headline: Paper mache flower letter
objectives_summary: Create flower letters step by step. Great for decorations or as a gift.

items.title: Spring Flowers in Chinese Painting

visible_instructors.title: Olga Sumarokova
visible_instructors.name: Olga
visible_instructors.job_title: Chinese painting teacher and professional artist

items.headline: The class of painting Crocus, Muscari and Forsythia in classical Chinese style. Ready picture in the end of each part.
objectives_summary: Main principles of drawing and color tone of flower painting
Painting  petals and the whole primroses in Chinese technique
How to choose brushes, ink and paper to get the best result

items.title: How to Drawing& Painting, Learning to Your Kid's
items.headline: Drawing Course for Parents in new way
objectives_summary: drawing

items.title: Hand Lettering Secrets: Create your own floral alphabet
items.headline: Learn to design the complete alphabet in capital style, each letter surrounded by leaves and flowers!
objectives_summary: Writing a whole alphabet in Cursive embellished Capital letters
Drawing suitable for coloring floral embellishments
Creating a coloring page using capital letters and floral embellishments
